original_text: If your foot causes you to do wrong things, you should cut it off. You will only have one foot, but you can have God's true life. It will be much worse if you keep your two feet and go to hell.

sentences.original_text: If your foot causes you to do wrong things,
sentences.korean_translation: 네 발이 너를 잘못된 행동하게 만든다면,

sentences.original_text: You will only have one foot,
but you can have God's true life.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 참된 생명을 누릴 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: if you keep your two feet
